item.title: Web3 - Reclaiming Identity Autonomy
item.description: In June 2021, Swarm launched its cryptocurrency, the BZZ token. BZZ is exchanged for Swarm Network services and protected against both inflation and speculation. Economic Oppression and Uncertainty The United States has asserted global dominance with the USD as the worldâ€™s primary reserve currency and through key international economic institutions since WWII. But many countries have grown tired of the inflation, economic crises and external political pressures associated with effectively being mandated to trade in this currency.
